title: TCS launches GenAI platform WisdomNext
description: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) launched the Gen AI platform WisdomNext, aggregating multiple GenAI technologies. The platform helps companies adopt next-gen technology, lower costs, and operate within a regulatory framework.
content: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is moving a significant chunk of its 200+ AI projects from proof-of-concept (PoC) to production with its new aggregate generative AI platform WisdomNext, a senior executive said on Friday.The company’s AI pipeline, which consists of short-term (less than 10 weeks) and medium-term (6-12 months) projects with smaller ticket size of investments, is likely to start generating revenue over the next few quarters, Krishna Mohan, deputy head of AI.Cloud unit at TCS, said at a press briefing.The IT services major on Friday launched WisdomNext for customising solutions for its clients. It has brought more than 100 customers on this GenAI platform over the last three quarters.A majority of these customers belong to banking, financial services, insurance (BFSI) sector, retail, travel, life sciences and healthcare, as well as manufacturing, Siva Ganesan, head of AI.Cloud at TCS, said.“This will help elevate business outcomes and deliver business value by harnessing the power of cloud and data,” Ganesan said. “It will give enterprises a choice to select the right large language models (LLMs) at an optimal cost... This will solve the last mile problem through AI.”
